description: Try our easy to follow Baked Mushroom with Leek & Bacon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot canapés,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Baked Mushroom with Leek & Bacon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large leek, white part only chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Trim mushrooms stem-side up in baking dish.

Heat oil in a frying pan. Cook bacon until crisp. Using a slotted spoon, remove bacon, leaving oil in pan. Add chopped mushroom stems, leek and green shallots and cook over a medium heat until very soft but not browned. Add garlic. Cool slightly.

Add parsley, 3/4 of cheese and cooked bacon. Stir to combine. Spoon mixture into mushrooms and scatter with remaining cheese. Bake for about 20 minutes or until mushrooms are tender and cheese is golden.
